entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
